column1: How?
Uh, Machu Picchu, sir?
Until the USDA gets control of the situation, sir.
It's okay, there's lots of toppings. Just eat the toppings.
Huh?
Go away, kid. You're grossing me out.
Beat it, kid! Come on, honey.
¿Qué?
We can't fire at them, sir. There are too many children.
Alright, Ms. Reno, let's go over the plan.
We'll drop you on the northwest corner of the backyard. You hop into the back of the house and find the quintuplets. When you see them, you say...
Good. And then hand them the Easter eggs filled with tear gas. Are you ready?
Code blue!
You can't see them, boys. They're happily reunited with their father.
Aaa-a-a-aaa-ah.
I was a practicing Jehovah's Witness.
They've gone, sir. It's like they've vanished out of thin air.
Harris! Reach bang and clear!
Alright, it's clear! It's clear!
Let's go let's go!
Get it!
Throw it down!
Alright, let's go!
Sir! Sergeant Masters and Boll are reporting, sir!
Go on! Ask him what terrifying secret.
Can I kill the towel now, sir?
Hey you!
I got him! I got him!
Dakadaka!
Sir, what should we do with this one?
Let's go! Move, move!
Secure, sir!
It'll all be over soon, robot!
